name: soos-azure-devops-task
description: SOOS Azure DevOps Security Analysis Task. Run SOOS SCA, DAST, SAST, SBOM, and Container analysis from your Azure DevOps pipeline. Register for a free trial at https://app.soos.io/register
author: SOOS
_comment: NOTE: Version is set by the build pipeline

scripts.setup:clean: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm outdated
scripts.link:soos-api-client: npm link @soos-io/api-client && npm run build && npm link
scripts.patch-api-client: npm run clean:all && npm install @soos-io/api-client@latest --save-exact && npm install && npm run check
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run setup:clean
